com.oneops.proxy.web

Class GroupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oneops.proxy.web.GroupController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/v1/apps/{appName}")
public class GroupController
extends Object
    An authenticated REST controller to manage Keywhiz application group and associated secrets. The appName is the OneOps environment name with {org}_{assembly}_{env} format, for which you are managing the secrets.
    Author:
    Suresh
    See Also:
    AuthzRestController

public GroupDetailResponseV2 info(@PathVariable(value="appName")

        Retrieve information on a group.
        Parameters:
        appName - OneOps application name.
        user - Authorized OneOpsUser
        Returns:
        Group information (GroupDetailResponseV2) retrieved.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws if the request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.

      • getSecretsExpiring

        @GetMapping(value="/secrets/expiring/{time}")
public List<String> getSecretsExpiring(@PathVariable(value="appName")
                                                                                     String appName,
                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="time")
                                                                                     long time,
                                                                                     @CurrentUser
                                                                                     OneOpsUser user)
                                                                              throws IOException
        Retrieve listing of secrets expiring soon in a group.
        Parameters:
        appName - OneOps application name.
        time - Timestamp for farthest expiry to include.
        user - Authorized OneOpsUser
        Returns:
        List of secrets name expiring soon in group.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws if the request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.

      • createSecret

        @PostMapping(value="/secrets/{secretName}")
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
public void createSecret(@RequestParam(value="createGroup",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                     boolean createGroup,
                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="appName")
                                                                                                     String appName,
                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="secretName")
                                                                                                     String secretName,
                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                     SecretRequest secretRequest,
                                                                                                     @CurrentUser
                                                                                                     OneOpsUser user)
                                                                                              throws IOException
        Creates new secret.
        Parameters:
        createGroup - true to create non existing application group. Default is false.
        appName - Application name.
        secretName - secret name.
        secretRequest - Secret request SecretRequest
        user - Authorized OneOpsUser
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws if the request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.
        KeywhizException - Throws if application group doesn't exist or the secret with the same name already exists.

      • updateSecret

        @PutMapping(value="/secrets/{secretName}")
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
public void updateSecret(@PathVariable(value="appName")
                                                                                                    String appName,
                                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="secretName")
                                                                                                    String secretName,
                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                    SecretRequest secretRequest,
                                                                                                    @CurrentUser
                                                                                                    OneOpsUser user)
                                                                                             throws IOException
        Updates the secret.
        Parameters:
        appName - Application name.
        secretName - secret name.
        secretRequest - Secret request SecretRequest
        user - Authorized OneOpsUser
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws if the request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.
        KeywhizException - Throws if the secret is not part of given application group.

      • getSecretVersions

        @GetMapping(value="/secrets/{secretName}/versions")
public List<SecretDetailResponseV2> getSecretVersions(@PathVariable(value="appName")
                                                                                                          String appName,
                                                                                                          @PathVariable(value="secretName")
                                                                                                          String secretName,
                                                                                                          @CurrentUser
                                                                                                          OneOpsUser user)
                                                                                                   throws IOException
        Retrieve all versions of this secret, sorted from newest to oldest update time.
        Parameters:
        appName - Application name.
        secretName - secret name.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws if the request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.
        KeywhizException - Throws if the secret not exists or is not part of given application group.

      • getSecretContent

        @PostMapping(value="/secrets/{secretName}/contents")
public SecretContent getSecretContent(@PathVariable(value="appName")
                                                                                           String appName,
                                                                                           @PathVariable(value="secretName")
                                                                                           String secretName,
                                                                                           @CurrentUser
                                                                                           OneOpsUser user)
                                                                                    throws IOException
        Retrieve contents for a set of secret series. This is a POST request because it updates the secret access metadata.
        Parameters:
        appName - Application name.
        secretName - secret name.
        user - Authorized OneOpsUser
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws if the request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.
        KeywhizException - Throws if the secret is not part of given application group.
